languages.text: "Не каждому даровано право задавать такие вопросы, но тебе я отвечу. Что же ты желаешь знать об Астартес со славного Фенриса?"
"Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"
languages.original_text: "Не каждому даровано право задавать такие вопросы, но тебе я отвечу. Что же ты желаешь знать об Астартес со славного Фенриса?"

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you I will answer. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you I will answer. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you I will answer. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不是所有人都有权问这样的问题，不过如果是你……我允许你提问。他们是阿斯塔特修士，来自荣耀的芬里斯。你想了解哪些事情？”
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: “不是所有人都有权问这样的问题，不过如果是你，我愿意回答。他们是阿斯塔特修士，来自荣耀的芬里斯。你想了解哪些事情？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No todo el mundo tiene derecho a hacer estas preguntas, pero a usted... se las contestaré. ¿Qué quiere saber sobre los Astartes del glorioso Fenris?».
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: «No todo el mundo tiene derecho a hacer estas preguntas, pero a usted se las contestaré. ¿Qué quiere saber sobre los Astartes del glorioso Fenris?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「そういった質問をする権利が誰にでもあるわけではないが、お前なら…いいだろう。栄光あるフェンリスのアスタルテスについて何を知りたい？」
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: 「そういった質問をする権利が誰にでもあるわけではないが、お前なら…いいだろう。栄光あるフェンリスのアスタルテスについて何を知りたい？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht jeder hat das Recht, solche Fragen zu stellen, doch Euch ... werde ich es gestatten. Was wollt Ihr über die Astartes der glorreichen Welt Fenris erfahren?"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht jeder hat das Recht, solche Fragen zu stellen, doch Euch werde ich antworten. Was wollt Ihr über die Astartes der glorreichen Welt Fenris erfahren?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne laisse qu'à peu de gens le privilège de me poser de telles questions, mais... je veux bien faire une exception pour vous. Que voulez-vous savoir sur les Astartes de la glorieuse Fenris ? »
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne laisse qu'à peu de gens le privilège de me poser de telles questions, mais j'y répondrai pour vous. Que voulez-vous savoir sur les Astartes du glorieux Fenris ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

languages.text: "Herkese böyle sorular sorma hakkı verilmez ama... Sana müsaade edebilirim. Şanlı Fenris'in Astartes'i hakkında ne bilmek istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone is granted the right to ask such questions, but you... I shall allow it. What do you want to know about the Astartes from the glorious Fenris?"

traits.locale_text: "Herkese böyle sorular sorma hakkı verilmez ama... Size izin verebilirim. Şanlı Fenris'in Astartes'i hakkında bilmek istediğiniz nedir?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
